description.zh-cn: 美国资本家、投资者、软件工程师及慈善家，与保罗·艾伦共同创办了微软公司。
description.en: American business magnate, investor, software developer, and philanthropist, who co-founded Microsoft Corporation with Paul Allen.

description.zh-cn: 美国企业家，与比尔·盖茨共同创办了微软公司。
description.en: American business magnate who co-founded Microsoft Corporation with Bill Gates.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国科技公司，由比尔·盖茨和保罗·艾伦于1975年创立。
description.en: An American multinational technology company founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 美国慈善家，比尔·盖茨的前妻，比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会的联合创始人。
description.en: American philanthropist, former wife of Bill Gates, and co-founder of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 美国律师，比尔·盖茨的父亲。
description.en: American attorney and father of Bill Gates.

description.zh-cn: 美国商界女性，曾任银行董事，是比尔·盖茨的母亲。
description.en: American businesswoman who served on a bank's board of directors, and was the mother of Bill Gates.

description.zh-cn: 位于西雅图的一所私立学校，比尔·盖茨和保罗·艾伦曾在此就读。
description.en: A private school in Seattle, attended by Bill Gates and Paul Allen.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学，比尔·盖茨曾在此就读但未毕业。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, which Bill Gates attended but did not graduate from.

nodes.id: 比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会

zh-cn: 比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会

description.zh-cn: 由比尔·盖茨和梅琳达·盖茨夫妇创办的美国私人基金会，是全球最大的私人基金会之一。
description.en: An American private foundation founded by Bill and Melinda Gates, one of the largest private foundations in the world.

description.zh-cn: 美国商人，曾于2000年至2014年担任微软首席执行官。
description.en: American businessman who served as the chief executive officer of Microsoft from 2000 to 2014.

description.zh-cn: 印度裔美国商业高管，自2014年起担任微软首席执行官。
description.en: Indian-American business executive who has been the chief executive officer of Microsoft since 2014.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工程科学技术界的最高荣誉性、咨询性学术机构。
description.en: The national academy for engineering of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国集团控股公司。
description.en: An American multinational conglomerate holding company.

description.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿州的一座城市，是比尔·盖茨的出生地。
description.en: A city in the U.S. state of Washington, the birthplace of Bill Gates.

description.zh-cn: 国际商业机器公司，是一家美国跨国科技和咨询公司。
description.en: International Business Machines Corporation, an American multinational technology and consulting company.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国微电脑硬件公司，开发了QDOS操作系统，后被微软购买并发展为MS-DOS。
description.en: An American microcomputer hardware company that developed the QDOS operating system, which was later purchased by Microsoft and became MS-DOS.

description.zh-cn: 微软公司为个人电脑开发的磁盘操作系统，是公司早期成功的关键。
description.en: A disk operating system for personal computers developed by Microsoft, which was key to the company's early success.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国科技公司，与微软在操作系统图形用户界面上存在竞争和法律纠纷。
description.en: An American multinational technology company that had competition and legal disputes with Microsoft over graphical user interfaces for its operating systems.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国，是一个由五十个州和一个联邦直辖区组成的联邦制共和国。
description.en: The United States of America is a federal republic composed of 50 states and a federal district.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人、投资者和慈善家，与比尔·盖茨共同投资了一家食品科技公司。
description.en: Hong Kong business magnate, investor, and philanthropist who co-invested in a food technology company with Bill Gates.

description.zh-cn: 一家由比尔·盖茨资助的核能公司，致力于开发行波反应堆。
description.en: A nuclear energy company funded by Bill Gates, focused on developing traveling wave reactors.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有企业，与泰拉能源探讨核反应堆建设合作。
description.en: A large state-owned enterprise in China that discussed cooperation on nuclear reactor construction with TerraPower.

description.zh-cn: 一场由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的全球性大流行病。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人，曾就新冠疫情与比尔·盖茨通信。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who corresponded with Bill Gates regarding the COVID-19 pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 比尔·盖茨与保罗·艾伦于1975年共同创立了微软公司。
description.en: Bill Gates co-founded Microsoft Corporation with Paul Allen in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 保罗·艾伦与比尔·盖茨于1975年共同创立了微软公司。
description.en: Paul Allen co-founded Microsoft Corporation with Bill Gates in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 盖茨于1973年进入哈佛大学就读，但在大三时（1975年）退学以全身心投入微软的创建和发展。
description.en: Gates enrolled at Harvard University in 1973 but dropped out in his junior year (1975) to devote himself fully to the creation and development of Microsoft.

description.zh-cn: 在湖滨中学相识，成为朋友和商业伙伴，后共同创立微软公司。
description.en: Met at Lakeside School, became friends and business partners, and later co-founded Microsoft Corporation.

position.zh-cn: 首席执行官、董事长、首席软件架构师、董事
position.en: CEO, Chairman, Chief Software Architect, Board Member

description.zh-cn: 比尔·盖茨曾担任微软首席执行官（至2000年）、董事长（至2014年），并于2020年3月离开董事会。
description.en: Bill Gates served as CEO of Microsoft until 2000, Chairman until 2014, and left the board in March 2020.

description.zh-cn: 2000年1月，巴尔默接任微软首席执行官，而盖茨担任董事长。在此期间，巴尔默向以盖茨为首的董事会汇报。
description.en: In January 2000, Ballmer took over as CEO of Microsoft while Gates served as Chairman. During this period, Ballmer reported to the board of directors, which was chaired by Gates.

description.zh-cn: 盖茨在2014年2月辞去董事长后，担任技术顾问，协助新任首席执行官纳德拉的工作。
description.en: After stepping down as chairman in February 2014, Gates served as a technology advisor to assist the newly appointed CEO, Satya Nadella.

description.zh-cn: 比尔·盖茨于2020年3月离任伯克希尔·哈撒韦的董事。
description.en: Bill Gates stepped down from the board of Berkshire Hathaway in March 2020.

description.zh-cn: 微软以5万美元的价格向西雅图电脑公司购买其开发的操作系统，并将其发展为MS-DOS。西雅图电脑公司后因微软未披露与IBM的谈判事宜而提起诉讼，双方最终庭外和解。
description.en: Microsoft purchased an operating system developed by Seattle Computer Products for $50,000 and developed it into MS-DOS. Seattle Computer Products later sued Microsoft for not disclosing its negotiations with IBM, and the two parties eventually settled out of court.

description.zh-cn: 微软向IBM授权其PC-DOS操作系统，用于IBM于1981年正式推出的个人电脑，此举推动了IBM个人电脑市场的成功。
description.en: Microsoft licensed its PC-DOS operating system to IBM for its personal computer, which was officially launched in 1981, boosting the success of the IBM PC market.

description.zh-cn: 苹果电脑曾就微软Windows操作系统的图形用户界面侵犯其版权提起诉讼。
description.en: Apple Computer, Inc. sued Microsoft for copyright infringement over the graphical user interface of the Microsoft Windows operating system.

description.zh-cn: 1990年代末，美国政府对微软公司提起一系列反垄断诉讼。
description.en: In the late 1990s, the U.S. government filed a series of antitrust lawsuits against Microsoft.

description.zh-cn: 共同投资了研发“人造蛋”的美国加州汉普顿溪食品公司。
description.en: Co-invested in Hampton Creek Foods, a California-based company developing 'artificial eggs'.

description.zh-cn: 比尔·盖茨旗下的泰拉能源与中国核工业集团探讨关于第四代反应堆的行波反应堆建设合作事宜。
description.en: TerraPower, a company under Bill Gates, discussed cooperation with China National Nuclear Corporation on the construction of a traveling wave reactor, a type of fourth-generation nuclear reactor.

relationships.source: 比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会

description.zh-cn: 在2019冠状病毒病疫情期间，盖茨基金会捐助资金支持中国政府的防疫工作及相关药物研发。
description.en: During the COVID-19 pandemic, the Gates Foundation donated funds to support the Chinese government's epidemic response and related drug development.

description.zh-cn: 就2019冠状病毒病疫情进行书信往来，盖茨在信中表达了对中国防疫行动的支持，习近平则回信表示感谢。
description.en: Corresponded regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, with Gates expressing support for China's epidemic prevention actions in his letter, and Xi Jinping replying with a letter of thanks.
